alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 10 at 5:41PM MDT until April 12 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible Tuesday. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains and Tusas Mountains Including Chama. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama
